full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BYAD GROL NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BYAD GROL GYI CHO GA NYUNG DU RNAM GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BLA MA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG SGROS DANG PHYAG LEN MTHONG BA BRGYUD PA LTAR, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS CHU STAG LO'I HOR ZLA GSUM PA'I TSES BCO LNGA'I NYIN LA DBEN GNAS BYANG CHUB CHEN PO'I PHO BRANG DU BSDEBS PA'I YI GE PA NI NYI 'KHOR ZHIG GO, ,'DI'I BRGYUD PA'ANG, MDZAD PA PO BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, BKA' CHEN YE SHES YAR PHEL RJE ZHANG ZHUNG PA YE SHES MTHA' YAS, DES BDAG DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO LA BKA' DRIN DU STZAL TO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
